name: Confederation of Organisations in Road Transport Enforcement
goal:
CORTE aims to develop and agree on:

1. harmonized Best Practice enforcement methodologies

2. common understanding, implementation and enforcement of Road Transport, Road Safety and Road Security Legislation.
interests: Customs, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Information Society, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Council Regulation (EU) N° 165/2014 on the new tachograph

Directive 2014/47/EC on Road Worthiness roadside check enforcement
